page.title: 16Politics
page.content: As regards the Parish Council elections there have not been any for some years:in Local District and County Council elections voters tend to vote for the personality rather than the party, but in Parliamentary elections most voters made up their minds long before the election.The majority vote Conservative with the Liberals a good second,but other parties only have a few votes.But most candidates would be advised ,especially Parliamentary, not to ask prospective voters what their politics are as some people regard their politics like a womans age,a secret.
